synopsis.text: Missnie, a girl with telekinetic abilities, has vanished, leading the Dirty Pair, Kei and Yuri, on a thrilling chase to the mining colony of Ookbar. Upon arrival, they discover their contact has been murdered, and the uncooperative Chief of Security, Samara, thwarts their investigation. Despite being ordered off the planet, the duo follows a lead to the mysterious rainforest of Nolandia, the only other habitable location on Ookbar. However, their journey takes a perilous turn when their ship crash-lands in the enigmatic jungle. Plagued by strange visions and bizarre creatures, Kei and Yuri must navigate the treacherous forest and unravel the mind-bending case to find Missnie and uncover the truth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
